title: The Beacon
description: Battle through ever-changing dungeons in this fast-paced action roguelite! Play solo or team up online, get that sweet loot, and personalize your settlement and character. Party up and chat in social hubs, all in a beautifully handmade pixel art world.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The Beacon is a free-to-play fantasy action rogue-lite RPG with MMO features like co-op gameplay, social hubs, player homes, and meta progression.
Battle through ever-changing dungeons with fast-paced action. Play solo or team up online, get that sweet loot, and personalize your settlement and character (to show it off in social hubs), all in a beautifully handmade pixel art world.

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-157us](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-157us.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Online Gameplay
<!--text-->
You may face the dungeons by yourself or bring some friends along.

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-7ue7p](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-7ue7p.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Chat, party up, or show off that sweet loot in lively social hubs like the Tavern!

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-1ay7y](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-1ay7y.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Ever-changing Dungeons
<!--text-->
Umbraâ€™s forces are chaotic in nature, changing the very structure of each dungeon to be different from one another.
Expect different paths, enemies, weapons, and field items in each run!

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-1w2gw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-1w2gw.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Character & House Customization
<!--text-->
The dungeons are dangerous and involve many risks, but the spoils and treasures make up for it.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Decorate your house; make it comfy, a magic workshop, or even a weird kind of obscure dungeon..?

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-1vqzv](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-1vqzv.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Customize your character with all sorts of handmade cosmetic items!

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-1ntl7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-1ntl7.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Discover the world
<!--text-->
Set in a world constantly threatened by an ever-growing darkness, humanity clings to survival under the waning light of The Beacon. It has been keeping the forces of Umbra at bay for ages, but now, its light is fading away.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Adventurers had to set sail in search of hope, finally founding Dawnport, the first Settlement away from the city-state capital, Altaris.

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-1v0yx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-1v0yx.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Years later, the Settlement is full of life and eccentric personalities, each with its own story and tales to tell.

<!--image-->
![The Beacon-fp9p4](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/1b284df50f6141c6974d9e2a94c11e06/the-beacon-fp9p4.png)
